Reading.Wyomissing Creek:
Wyomissing Creek is a 9.1-mile-long (14.6 km) tributary of the Schuylkill River in Berks County, Pennsylvania in the United States. Wyomissing Creek joins the Schuylkill River at Wyomissing.
Wyomissing is a name derived from a Native American language purported to mean "place of flats".
